verbs.description: “ To [V: be] [ARG2: a Trump supporter] [ARGM-TMP: in 2018] is to have seen every cruelty unleashed thus far and to bay for more , ” she writes .

“ To be a Trump supporter in 2018 is to [V: have] seen every cruelty unleashed thus far and to bay for more , ” she writes .
“ To be a Trump supporter in 2018 is to have [V: seen] [ARG1: every cruelty unleashed thus far] and to bay for more , ” she writes .
“ To be a Trump supporter in 2018 is to have seen [ARG1: every cruelty] [V: unleashed] [ARGM-TMP: thus far] and to bay for more , ” she writes .
“ To be a Trump supporter in 2018 is to have seen every cruelty unleashed thus far and to [V: bay] [ARG1: for more] , ” she writes .
“ [ARG1: To be a Trump supporter in 2018 is to have seen every cruelty unleashed thus far and to bay for more] , ” [ARG0: she] [V: writes] .
